common.appDescription: Create and share AI character templates.

aiProviderBanner.title: AI Provider Not Connected
aiProviderBanner.description: Connect an AI provider to start creating.

home.title: Trending Memes, Now Featuring You.
home.subtitle: Put yourself into your favorite meme images and share with friends.
home.featuresTitle: Everything You Need, All in One Place
home.feature1Description: Don't worry if you're new to generative AI. With templates, anyone can be a pro!
home.feature2Description: Share your masterpieces with a single click and let others enjoy them.
home.feature3Description: Create templates, share images, and connect with other creators in our vibrant community.
home.ctaDescription: Sign in and dive into the community.

settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

eula.title: End User License Agreement
eula.section1Content: By accessing or using Ditto, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Service.
eula.section2Content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
eula.section3Content: You retain ownership of any content you create and upload to Ditto. By uploading content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display your content in connection with the Service.
eula.section4Content: You may not use the Service for any illegal purposes or in violation of these Terms. You may not upload content that infringes on intellectual property rights, contains hate speech, or is otherwise harmful.
eula.section5Content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the Service at any time without notice. We are not liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuation of the Service.
eula.section6Content: The Service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the Service.
eula.section7Content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for any reason, including violation of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.
eula.section8Content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including your GitHub account information, uploaded images, templates, and any content you create or share through the Service.
privacy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our Service, to communicate with you, and to protect the rights and safety of our users.
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating the Service, or when required by law.
privacy.section4Content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.section5Content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can manage your data through your account settings or by contacting us.
privacy.section6Content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience and analyze how our Service is used.
privacy.section7Content: Our Service may contain links to third-party services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties.
privacy.section8Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
